name: Mystery Blast
description:
Reverse a dramatic experiment of the Alchemist that turned once a prosperous small town into the place full of gloomy atmosphere. Save the Alchemist himself who has turned into a dark figure of the Mountain!

Features:
- Intricate Puzzle Cubes;
- Immerse yourself into a thrilling atmosphere;
- Find out the Mystery of the Mountain;
- Save the Alchemist and his town!
- Get the chance to manipulate ancient elements;
- Use powerful boosters and move confidently towards the Truth!
- Over a thousand breathtaking quests;
- Other exciting challenges!

- All quests are available without additional fees;
- Amazing HD graphics: intense mystical atmosphere;
- No ads, Wifi or Internet connection required.

Abysmal Portals, Magic Chains, and Wills - Master all puzzles of the game!

Be the Savior and be the Mystic!

Dwellers of the town need your help! Download the game now! Lots of challenges await!
